summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Grizzly Man Review Date: 2005/12/30 Store: Timothy Treadwell (Actor), Werner Herzog (Director) Rated: R Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Lionsgate Home Entertainment, Lionsgate Indie Selects Product Description: ['In this mesmerizing new film, acclaimed director Werner Herzog explores the life and death of amateur grizzly bear expert and wildlife preservationist Timothy Treadwell, who lived unarmed among grizzlies for 13 summers.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Documentary', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Timothy Treadwell, Werner Herzog', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 43 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': '31398186366', 'Director': 'Werner Herzog', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 43 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 26, 2005', 'Actors': 'Timothy Treadwell', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: I thought I was going to see some really outstanding grizzly filming. This movie should have been labeled "One man's descent into insanity". Timothy Treadwell was a self absorbed,selfish, egocentric man and this story is about him and not the bears. Due to his own behavior he became a dish for one of the bears. Too bad he took someone else along with him to his death. A couple of the bears he "loved" so much had to be murdered because of his behavior. I would not recommend this movie. Review Title: Conservationist? Who? Timothy Treadwell? Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Way Review Date: 2012/03/30 Store: Emilio Estevez (Actor, Director), Martin Sheen (Actor) Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Drama Product Description: ['"The Way" is a powerful and inspirational story about family, friends, and the challenges we face while navigating this ever-changing and complicated world. Martin Sheen plays Tom, who comes to St. Jean Pied de Port, France to collect the remains of his adult son , killed in the Pyrenees in a storm while walking the Camino de Santiago,. Rather than return home, Tom decides to embark on the historical pilgrimage to honor his son\'s desire to finish the journey. What Tom doesn\'t plan on is the profound impact the journey will have on him. From the unexpected and, oftentimes, amusing experiences along "The Way," Tom begins to learn what it means to be a citizen of the world again. Through his unresolved relationship with his son, he discovers the difference between "the life we live and the life we choose."'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Emilio Estevez, Martin Sheen', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 1 minute', 'Studio': 'Arc Entertainment', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '5.4 x 0.6 x 7.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Emilio Estevez', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '2 hours and 1 minute', 'Release date': 'February 21, 2012', 'Actors': 'Emilio Estevez, Martin Sheen', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: I've added The Way to my list of all time favorite movies. I'm surprised it didn't do better at the box office. Review Title: Excellent and thoughtful movie Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Alpha House Review Date: 2014/01/05 Categories: Comedy, Drama Product Description: ["An Amazon Original series: They work in the Senate. They live in the house - Alpha House. Created by Garry Trudeau (Doonesbury, Tanner '88)."] Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Deutsch'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Deutsch'], 'Directors': ['Adam Bernstein', 'Michael Mayer', 'Andrew McCarthy', 'Bob Balaban', 'Jann Turner', 'Jake Schreier', 'Antoine Douaihy', 'Clark Johnson', 'Michael Pressman'], 'Producers': ['Jonathan Alter']} Review Text: I am impressed with the program and the actors involved. I hope this is not the way Washington really is. However, I suspect that it is.
I look forward to each week's episodes. When I watched the first episode I wasn't sure this program would be cancelled. Now I'm hooked and look forward to each new episode. Review Title: A excellent tv program Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/01/23 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Lee Daniels'], 'Producers': ['Pamela Oas Williams', 'Laura Ziskin', 'Lee Daniels', 'Buddy Patrick', 'Cassian Elwes'], 'Starring': ['Forest Whitaker', 'Oprah Winfrey', 'Mariah Carey'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']} Review Text: This movie spanned about 70 years. It was more of a movie about civil rights. Entwined was the real life story of the White House Buller. Forest Whitaker played the role well and deserves accolades for his performance. **Shopping Preferences Summary:**

- **Genres:** Strong preference for **drama, documentaries, and comedies**; significant interest in **independent films**.
- **Favorites:** Generally favors films with strong narratives and emotional depth, evidenced by high ratings for **character-driven stories** and **family themes**.
- **Directors and Actors:** Shows consistent interest in works by **Martin Sheen, Emilio Estevez, and Werner Herzog**. 
- **Series Preference:** Engages with **serialized content, particularly political dramas** and adaptations of literary works.
- **Ratings Trends:** Positive ratings and detailed praise for films that evoke **deep emotional responses** or provide **thought-provoking content** (often rating **5 stars**). Conversely, critical ratings for films perceived as unengaging or poorly executed.
- **Content Sensitivity:** Some purchases include warnings for **violence, language, and mature themes**, suggesting a tolerance for **edgy content** when it serves a compelling narrative.
- **Overall Engagement:** Exhibits a mix of skepticism toward **ecological narratives** and a preference for stories showcasing **human resilience and personal journeys**. Frequent returns to specific actors and filmmakers highlight a desire for **consistent quality and reliability in entertainment choices**.
